job.title: New Graduate - Software Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtSeatGeek is building the future of live events And we need your helpltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWhether it is celebrating your favorite teams victory dancing to your favorite DJ with thousands of new friends or enjoying your favorite Broadway show one thing is for certain ltstronggtnothing beats liveltstronggt Thats even more true today than it was before the pandemicltbrgtltbrgtSeatGeek is a technology innovator on a mission to disrupt the 300 billion ticketing industry We have the product vision and team to make life better for performers venues and fans and build a generational consumer brand in the process All were missing is youltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtFind Your Squad ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtSoftware is a team sport and our team is ready for the big leagues We all come from different professional and personal backgrounds and we take pride in the fact that our diversity makes us stronger more resilient and better at empathizing with our users Weve all come here along different paths but we are united by our commitment to our mission but also to each other You will have colleagues here who will become lifelong collaborators and friendsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtBuild Your SkillsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtBy starting your career at SeatGeek you will have many opportunities to develop deep knowledge and practical skills that will take you far We are solving complex performance problems building a manysided marketplace empowering a datadriven business and scaling our software to support our booming business We pride ourselves on building performant beautiful inclusive interfaces that delight our users and enhance our brand In parallel we are constantly evaluating new technologies and improving our software stack to keep our technological edge While working on these hard problems you will receive mentorship from industry leading experts whove seen them beforeltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtMake Your MarkltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWe build innovative features to a level of technical excellence that our competitors struggle to copy We are able to accomplish this because we have a strong culture of individual ownership and responsibility While working at SeatGeek you will design cloud native software architecture solve customer problems define technology patterns and run experiments that determine the future of our business for years to comeltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtOpen Roles for New GraduatesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWe are hiring New College Graduates for the following roles Experience in that role is preferred but not required We support you learning new technologies as long as the aptitude and attitude are thereltbrgtltulgtltligtBackend Python GoltligtltligtFrontend Web Typescript  ReactltligtltligtiOS Swift  Objective CltligtltligtAndroid KotlinltligtltligtData Eng Python Scala SparkltligtltligtPlatform AWS Docker Python GoltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtPerksltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtEquity stake in a wellfunded growth stage companyltligtltligtA hybrid inoffice approach allowing you to work remotely a couple of days a weekltligtltligtA WFH stipend to support your home office setupltligtltligtThe ability to work from anywhere up to four weeks per year with SeatGeek on TourltligtltligtBenefits package that supports healthdentalvision We also provide annual subscriptions to Headspace Gingerio and One Medical ltligtltligtA focus on transparency We have regular company meetings and QampampA panels where employees can chat openly with teams across SeatGeek our cofounders and external guests from the industryltligtltligt120 a month to spend on tickets to live eventsltligtltligtAnnual subscription to Spotify Apple Music or Amazon musicltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtAbout UsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtHi were SeatGeek aka the managers of your greatest moments The official ticketer of your favorite acts and the unofficial ticketer of nailbiters show stealers and strangers hugging other strangersltbrgtltbrgtWe dont take those responsibilities lightly In fact were weirdly obsessed with making ticketing great Like the way youre weirdly obsessed with your favorite acts Kind ofltbrgtltbrgtWe believe that there is nothing cooler than giving a st and we promise to give a st about you By creating a ticketing process that is fast seamless human and helpful forgettable in the best waysltbrgtltbrgtBecause a ticket after all is just the beginning of a life more livedltbrgtltbrgtSeatGeek Expect MoreltbrgtltbrgtltemgtSeatGeek is committed to providing equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment regardless of race color religion creed age national origin or ancestry ethnicity sex sexual orientation gender identity or expression disability military or veteran status or any other category protected by federal state or local law As an equal opportunities employer we recognize that diversity is a positive attribute and we welcome the differences and benefits that a diverse culture brings Come join usltemgt
